channel.title: LFS on ashish.one
channel.description: Recent content in LFS on ashish.one

item.title: Challenges in linuxfromscratch
item.description: I have started with www.linuxfromscratch.org, I am facing some challenges and problems which I am going to share with you in this blog. I will keep updating this blog as well as I move forward. Before we get start You need some basic linux command knowledge to use linuxfromscratch guide. I am going to build LFS on my local machine. If your machine has a different OS or different configuration, Then some solution will not work.
